ModMetaData.name: Animal Armor: Vanilla
ModMetaData.author: Oh God Spiders No
ModMetaData.description:
<color=yellow>INCOMPATIBILITY NOTE:</color> Good news! There is only one mod that this is incompatible with: <color=orange>Animal Variety Coats</color>
Unfortunately this can only be fixed on their end. If you'd like them to address this, ask them to <color=orange>"replace the off-center cougar south images"</color>
